Trainer¶

This module contains the Trainer class for training PyTorch models.

Classes: Trainer: A class for training PyTorch models.

Dependencies: - torch

class trainers.trainer.Trainer(model, loss_fn, optimizer, scheduler=None)¶

Bases: object

A class for training PyTorch models.

model¶

The PyTorch model to be trained.

Type

torch.nn.Module

loss_fn¶

The loss function to be used during training.

Type

callable

optimizer¶

The optimizer to be used during training.

Type

torch.optim.Optimizer

scheduler¶

An optional learning rate scheduler.

Type

torch.optim.lr_scheduler._LRScheduler

train(data_loader)¶

Trains the model on the provided data.

train_with_scheduler(data_loader)¶

Trains the model on the provided data with learning rate scheduling.

train(data_loader)¶

Trains the model on the provided data.

Parameters

data_loader (torch.utils.data.DataLoader) – The data loader containing the training data.

Returns

The average training loss per batch.

train_with_scheduler(data_loader)¶

Trains the model on the provided data with learning rate scheduling.

Parameters

data_loader (torch.utils.data.DataLoader) – The data loader containing the training data.

Returns

The average training loss per batch.
